content.rendered:
Corrected Dates for Chick-fil-A® Story Time

Join us at Chick-fil-A® on HWY 96 on February 28th for Kids Club at 5:30 p.m. Gottwals Books will also be at Chick-fil-A’s® Story Time for preschoolers on Thursday, March 2nd, at 10:00 a.m. There will be crafts, giveaways, and Dr. Seuss stories. See you there!

 

Shane Gottwals at ABA’s Winter Institute

In January, Shane Gottwals moderated a panel at the ABA (American Bookseller’s Association) Winter Institute, a conference with 650 booksellers from around the nation. More details can be found here: http://www.publishersweekly.com/pw/by-topic/childrens/childrens-industry-news/article/72750-children-s-bookselling-tips-from-winter-institute-2017.html

 

Perry Store Makeover

We gave the Perry store a small face lift this week. Check out the results!
